opportunities.title: Leadership Transition Support
opportunities.description: Lisa Bolger is planning to transition out of her role by early next year and has requested AC to lead the search for her replacement.
opportunities.supportingQuote: Lisa is planning to transition out of her role by March-April-May next year to pursue coaching, and she specifically requested that AC lead the search for her replacement.
opportunities.suggestedAction: Prioritize the search for Lisa's replacement and ensure AC is prepared to lead this process.

opportunities.title: Deepen Relationship with US Team
opportunities.description: Improving the US team's listening skills and cultural understanding could strengthen the relationship and expand CompanyA's influence in the US market.
opportunities.supportingQuote: Need for more listening on US side compared to European side, sometimes tendency to 'over talk' rather than listen.
opportunities.suggestedAction: Conduct training sessions for the US team focused on active listening and cultural alignment with PartnerRe's values.

opportunities.title: Enhance Multi-Stakeholder Coordination
opportunities.description: Challenges in coordinating searches with multiple stakeholders indicate a need for improved processes to strengthen the partnership.
opportunities.supportingQuote: Challenges managing searches with multiple stakeholders across US and Europe, especially when hiring manager is different from engagement lead.
opportunities.suggestedAction: Develop and implement a standardized process for managing multi-stakeholder searches to ensure smoother coordination.

opportunities.title: Balance Candidate Presentation
opportunities.description: There is a need to maintain a balance between presenting good candidates and ensuring an authentic fit to avoid the perception of overselling.
opportunities.supportingQuote: Concern that CompanyA might be overselling candidates to prove they can do better.
opportunities.suggestedAction: Train the team to focus on authentic candidate fit rather than overselling, particularly in challenging searches.

opportunities.title: Enhance Timeline and Logistics Management
opportunities.description: Improving coordination for multi-stakeholder searches, especially around scheduling, would enhance service delivery.
opportunities.supportingQuote: Some delays and coordination issues, especially with last-minute scheduling requests.
opportunities.suggestedAction: Implement better scheduling tools and processes to manage timelines and logistics efficiently.

opportunities.title: Structured Follow-Up with Placed Candidates
opportunities.description: Vanessa expressed a desire for follow-up calls with the placed candidate, Anne, at key milestones to gather feedback and ensure successful integration.
opportunities.supportingQuote: Vanessa hopes for follow-up calls at a few weeks, 3 months, and 6 months to get candid feedback.
opportunities.suggestedAction: Implement a structured follow-up process with placed candidates at key milestones to gather feedback and ensure successful integration.

opportunities.title: Timely Delivery of Candidate Reports
opportunities.description: Initial candidate reports were sent too close to the interview date, limiting preparation time for Vanessa.
opportunities.supportingQuote: Initial candidate reports were sent only 48 hours before interviews... too short notice for thorough preparation.
opportunities.suggestedAction: Establish a standard practice of sending candidate reports 3-4 business days before interviews to allow proper preparation time.

opportunities.title: Fee Structure Flexibility for Non-Exco Positions
opportunities.description: Vanessa mentioned that the high fees limit the use of CompanyA's services to Exco level positions only.
opportunities.supportingQuote: Fees are higher than other headhunters in Belgium - limiting use to Exco level positions only.
opportunities.suggestedAction: Consider fee structure flexibility for non-Exco positions to expand market opportunity in Belgium.

opportunities.title: Emphasize Confidentiality in Sensitive Searches
opportunities.description: Confidentiality and trust were key factors in selecting CompanyA, especially in small markets like Belgium.
opportunities.supportingQuote: CompanyA's approach to confidentiality was exceptional... critical in Belgium's small market.
opportunities.suggestedAction: Continue emphasizing confidentiality approach in pitches for sensitive searches.

opportunities.title: Succession Planning Evaluation Services
opportunities.description: TriSummit Utilities has identified gaps in their succession planning matrix, indicating a need for comprehensive capability assessments.
opportunities.supportingQuote: Succession planning gaps - the company's succession matrix had names but no real assessment of capability.
opportunities.suggestedAction: Develop and offer services to evaluate and enhance succession planning matrices for clients.

opportunities.title: Board-Level Coaching and Development
opportunities.description: There is an opportunity to provide third-party coaching and development services at the board level, which is needed for external validation.
opportunities.supportingQuote: Board-level coaching and development - opportunity identified for third-party assistance in board-level coaching.
opportunities.suggestedAction: Create and market board-level coaching and development offerings to meet shareholder validation needs.

opportunities.title: Discuss Succession Planning Services
opportunities.description: Greg Aarssen plans to meet with ConsultantA to discuss succession planning services, indicating a strong potential for expanded engagement.
opportunities.supportingQuote: Greg is planning to meet with ConsultantA to discuss succession planning services, showing strong potential for expanded engagement.
opportunities.suggestedAction: Prepare a detailed proposal for succession planning services to present during the upcoming meeting with Greg Aarssen.

opportunities.title: Enhance Marketing and Brand Visibility
opportunities.description: CompanyA's visibility is limited outside of golf sponsorships, suggesting a need for broader marketing efforts.
opportunities.supportingQuote: CompanyA's marketing and visibility - Greg only knew of them through golf sponsorship and wouldn't have heard of them otherwise.
opportunities.suggestedAction: Expand marketing efforts beyond golf sponsorship to include corporate governance education and director training.

opportunities.title: Develop Educational Content Formats
opportunities.description: There is a need for more accessible educational content, such as one-pagers and conversations, especially for senior executives.
opportunities.supportingQuote: Education and thought leadership - opportunity to provide more educational content (one-pagers, conversations) rather than long papers.
opportunities.suggestedAction: Create concise educational materials and opportunities for dialogue tailored to senior executives.

opportunities.title: Compensation Benchmarking Structure
opportunities.description: CompanyA faces conflicts of interest in providing compensation benchmarking during searches, necessitating third-party services.
opportunities.supportingQuote: Compensation benchmarking conflict - CompanyA couldn't provide compensation review because they were involved in the search.
opportunities.suggestedAction: Explore partnerships with third-party firms to offer independent compensation benchmarking services.

opportunities.title: Need for Diverse Consultant Teams
opportunities.description: Jeanette highlighted the importance of having female consultants to attract and identify female candidates, which was lacking in the current engagement.
opportunities.supportingQuote: Diversity in candidate slate - had to repeatedly request women candidates; all consultants were male.
opportunities.suggestedAction: Recruit and deploy more female consultants, especially for roles requiring diverse candidate slates.

opportunities.title: Enhance Compensation Expertise
opportunities.description: There was a lack of detailed understanding of compensation structures, which is critical for senior roles.
opportunities.supportingQuote: Compensation information was extremely difficult to obtain - couldn't get current compensation details until offer stage.
opportunities.suggestedAction: Train consultants on compensation structures and develop better benchmarking capabilities.

opportunities.title: Follow-up and Relationship Repair
opportunities.description: Jeanette is open to future engagements if improvements are made, indicating a need to repair and strengthen the relationship.
opportunities.supportingQuote: Jeanette is open to future engagements if improvements are made.
opportunities.suggestedAction: Continue outreach efforts and use feedback to improve future engagements.

opportunities.title: Improve Project Management and Communication
opportunities.description: Reports often arrived too late, and there was inefficient communication, which hindered preparation and process management.
opportunities.supportingQuote: Reports arrived too late - often landing 1-2 hours before calls with 7 new CVs, making preparation impossible.
opportunities.suggestedAction: Send reports well in advance of calls and proactively manage timelines.

opportunities.title: Increase Assertiveness and Pace
opportunities.description: The consultants were too hesitant and did not match the high-energy client expectations, requiring the client to drive conversations.
opportunities.supportingQuote: Lack of assertiveness - consultants were hesitant, didn't proactively recommend top candidates.
opportunities.suggestedAction: Match high-energy client expectations by proactively recommending top candidates and driving conversations.

opportunities.title: Proactive Brief Alignment
opportunities.description: Consultants did not proactively identify when candidates weren't matching the brief, requiring the client to initiate course correction conversations.
opportunities.supportingQuote: Brief alignment - didn't proactively identify when candidates weren't matching brief.
opportunities.suggestedAction: Regularly check in on brief alignment and initiate course correction conversations when necessary.

opportunities.title: Compensation Process Improvement
opportunities.description: The process of gathering and presenting compensation information was delayed and unclear, nearly causing the loss of a preferred candidate.
opportunities.supportingQuote: Nearly lost preferred candidate due to compensation delays.
opportunities.suggestedAction: Gather detailed compensation information early and provide clear structure breakdowns.

opportunities.title: Potential for Broader Consultancy Roles
opportunities.description: The board chair expressed openness to using Korn Ferry for broader consultancy roles beyond executive search.
opportunities.supportingQuote: The board chair is open to using Korn Ferry for broader consultancy roles.
opportunities.suggestedAction: Explore opportunities to offer consultancy services in areas such as strategic planning or organizational development.

opportunities.title: Leverage KF4 Assessment Tool
opportunities.description: Korn Ferry's KF4 assessment tool was used effectively during the CEO search process, indicating potential for wider application.
opportunities.supportingQuote: Korn Ferry's KF4 assessment tool was used for both candidates and the museum director.
opportunities.suggestedAction: Propose using the KF4 tool for other leadership assessments or team development initiatives at the museum.

opportunities.title: Follow-Up on CEO Onboarding
opportunities.description: The new CEO's onboarding is just starting, presenting an opportunity to ensure a smooth transition and reinforce Korn Ferry's support.
opportunities.supportingQuote: The new CEO's onboarding is just starting.
opportunities.suggestedAction: Schedule a follow-up meeting to discuss the onboarding process and offer additional support or resources as needed.

opportunities.title: Enhanced Understanding of Matrix Roles
opportunities.description: Greg highlighted a lack of understanding of the matrix COO role, which affected candidate alignment.
opportunities.supportingQuote: I think they struggled to understand what the matrix nature of the organization of the business was, what the role was.
opportunities.suggestedAction: Invest in training consultants to better understand complex and matrix-style roles to improve candidate alignment.

opportunities.title: Proactive Engagement and Market Insights
opportunities.description: Greg appreciated proactive updates and market insights from competitors, which Korn Ferry could emulate to deepen client relationships.
opportunities.supportingQuote: The lead consultant has been on the phone every week, without fail. Never had to chase them, and they're proactively engaging with us.
opportunities.suggestedAction: Implement regular, proactive communication with clients, offering market insights and updates to strengthen relationships.

opportunities.title: Rebuild Trust and Value Perception
opportunities.description: The client expressed dissatisfaction with the value received for fees paid, indicating a need to rebuild trust.
opportunities.supportingQuote: We've just paid 70 grand in fees for someone that we gave them, which feels a bit of a stink.
opportunities.suggestedAction: Engage with the client to address concerns about value and demonstrate commitment to delivering quality service.

opportunities.title: Align Candidate Quality Expectations
opportunities.description: There was a disconnect between the client's expectations and the candidates presented, indicating a need for better alignment.
opportunities.supportingQuote: Some of the people on the shortlist had minimal experience... after five minutes, you knew they just were nowhere near what you wanted.
opportunities.suggestedAction: Work closely with clients to align on candidate quality expectations early in the process.

opportunities.title: Clarify Compensation and Offer Process
opportunities.description: The client experienced confusion around compensation discussions and the offer process, suggesting a need for clearer guidance.
opportunities.supportingQuote: When it came to saying, right, perhaps our candidate, let's negotiate. What does she expect? And the answer was, I don't know.
opportunities.suggestedAction: Provide clear guidance on compensation and offer processes, including market benchmarks and candidate expectations.

opportunities.title: Flexible Client Engagement
opportunities.description: The client felt engagement was based on consultant availability rather than their needs, indicating a need for more flexible communication.
opportunities.supportingQuote: Engagement often depended on consultant availability rather than client need.
opportunities.suggestedAction: Adapt engagement strategies to be more flexible and responsive to client availability and needs.

opportunities.title: Need for Candidates with Asian Market Experience
opportunities.description: Harry expressed a desire for candidates with more experience in the Asian market, acknowledging the challenge due to the market's youth.
opportunities.supportingQuote: I would have liked to see someone with a lot more Asian experience... but I also have to be fair to Korn Ferry — not necessarily a lot of those people exist, right? Because it's a very young market.
opportunities.suggestedAction: Korn Ferry should enhance their candidate pool with expertise in the Asian market to better meet future client needs.

opportunities.title: Address Cost Concerns for Small Companies
opportunities.description: Harry noted that consultancy work is costly for his small company, which affects his decision to prioritize recruitment services over broader consultancy.
opportunities.supportingQuote: I'm a small company...and they are, of course, costly, right? I mean, these guys are not cheap...I can only spend $1 once, and I don't have that many dollars, right?
opportunities.suggestedAction: Korn Ferry should consider offering tailored pricing or packages for small companies to make broader consultancy services more accessible.

opportunities.title: Leverage Strong Endorsement for Future Recruitment
opportunities.description: Harry strongly endorsed Korn Ferry for senior-level recruitment and expressed willingness to use the same team again.
opportunities.supportingQuote: If it would happen again, I would choose exactly the same team, right? I wouldn't change that.
opportunities.suggestedAction: Korn Ferry should maintain and strengthen their recruitment services to ensure continued client satisfaction and loyalty.

opportunities.title: Re-engage with Cost-Effective Solutions
opportunities.description: Harry's cost sensitivity suggests a need for re-engagement with solutions that offer value for money, especially in consultancy.
opportunities.supportingQuote: So...would they come to me top of the list for an organizational development? No, I don't think I would put them on top of the list.
opportunities.suggestedAction: Korn Ferry should explore cost-effective consultancy options or demonstrate the ROI of their services to re-engage clients like Harry.

opportunities.title: Potential Role of AI in Recruitment
opportunities.description: Tony mentioned that AI could play a role in logistics or market reach in the future, although currently, the human touch is more valued.
opportunities.supportingQuote: Tony noted that while AI could play a role in logistics or market reach in the future, today the value of Korn Ferry lies in its people-first approach.
opportunities.suggestedAction: Explore potential AI applications that could complement the human-centric approach in recruitment logistics and market reach.

opportunities.title: Enhance Compensation Benchmarking Support
opportunities.description: While compensation benchmarking is managed internally, Korn Ferry could provide additional data points to inform Carilion's analysis.
opportunities.supportingQuote: If Korn Ferry had that information, it could help inform us as a data point, but it would not be the benchmark we would use in our final analysis.
opportunities.suggestedAction: Offer to provide comprehensive compensation data to support Carilion's internal benchmarking processes.

opportunities.title: Position Assessment Tools as Complementary
opportunities.description: Korn Ferry's assessment tools are valued but should be positioned as complementary to Carilion's internal tools.
opportunities.supportingQuote: Korn Ferry's leadership assessments are valued but sit alongside Carilion Clinic's existing internal tools.
opportunities.suggestedAction: Emphasize the complementary nature of Korn Ferry's assessment tools in communications with Carilion Clinic.

opportunities.title: Enhance Initial Communication Alignment
opportunities.description: Improve communication style and cadence at the outset to meet client expectations for responsiveness and preferred communication methods.
opportunities.supportingQuote: we are a time sensitive organization...we're hearing back within two three hours. Sometimes it would be overnight, sometimes it would be a little bit longer.
opportunities.suggestedAction: Set clear communication expectations upfront, including SLAs, preferred channels, and response times.

opportunities.title: Strengthen Contingency Planning
opportunities.description: Ensure a continuous flow of candidates until a hire is fully confirmed to avoid over-reliance on a single finalist.
opportunities.supportingQuote: We potentially dodged a bullet, because if things had not ended up working out with our candidate choice...I was not quite comfortable that we had a ready backup pool.
opportunities.suggestedAction: Maintain a candidate pipeline until an offer is fully secured and apply this practice consistently.

opportunities.title: Proactive Assessment Result Notifications
opportunities.description: Implement proactive notifications for assessment results to avoid delays and reduce reliance on client follow-up.
opportunities.supportingQuote: there hadn't been a communication from the team beyond sending it to a dedicated mailbox...that sort of proactive nudge that says, Hey...This is where things are standing. That was missing.
opportunities.suggestedAction: Embed proactive assessment notifications as a standard practice to alert clients when outputs are sent.

opportunities.title: Rehire Potential with Communication Refinements
opportunities.description: Andre confirmed willingness to re-engage Korn Ferry with improvements around communication expectations.
opportunities.supportingQuote: I would say that in general, it was a positive experience. If we had search to do over again, I would rehire them, as long as we did some early setting of communication preferences.
opportunities.suggestedAction: Re-engage with Andre by addressing communication preferences and timeliness of responses.

opportunities.title: Need for Association-Specific Expertise
opportunities.description: The client highlighted a gap in understanding the unique operational and governance model of associations, suggesting a need for consultants with specific expertise in this area.
opportunities.supportingQuote: The consultant struggled to fully grasp the unique operational and governance model of associations.
opportunities.suggestedAction: Deploy consultants with experience in member-driven governance models for future association-related searches.

opportunities.title: Leverage Sector Credibility for Future Engagements
opportunities.description: Despite challenges, Korn Ferry's prior work with national associations initially built trust, indicating potential to expand relationships in the association sector.
opportunities.supportingQuote: Sector credibility drove selection. Prior work with the national association gave Korn Ferry initial trust and an advantage in pitching.
opportunities.suggestedAction: Highlight successful past association engagements in future pitches to reinforce credibility and attract similar clients.

opportunities.title: Rebuild Trust Through Governance Alignment
opportunities.description: The client's confidence in re-engagement was affected by governance misalignment, suggesting a need to rebuild trust by adhering to agreed processes.
opportunities.supportingQuote: Deference to the Board Chair over the agreed committee undermined trust and created tension.
opportunities.suggestedAction: Ensure strict adherence to client governance structures in future engagements to rebuild trust and facilitate re-engagement.

opportunities.title: Enhance Responsiveness to Client Feedback
opportunities.description: The client experienced delays in actioning feedback, indicating a need for improved responsiveness to build trust.
opportunities.supportingQuote: Feedback sometimes required repeating before being actioned.
opportunities.suggestedAction: Implement a feedback tracking system to ensure prompt action on client feedback and improve responsiveness.

opportunities.title: Align Candidate Selection with Client Criteria
opportunities.description: Misalignment in candidate selection, including compensation mismatches, suggests a need for better alignment with client criteria.
opportunities.supportingQuote: Some recommendations did not reflect the client's clear criteria or feedback.
opportunities.suggestedAction: Conduct thorough alignment meetings with clients to ensure candidate selection criteria are clearly understood and adhered to.

opportunities.title: Clarify Assessment Approach Early
opportunities.description: Michael emphasized the need for proactive discussion about assessment processes to avoid overlap with Cargill's internal process.
opportunities.supportingQuote: My only recommendation is make sure you have a very clear conversation with your client about your assessment, whether they have one, and whether it makes sense to do both. Yeah, upfront.
opportunities.suggestedAction: Initiate early discussions with clients to align on assessment processes and avoid duplication.

opportunities.title: Maintain Pipeline Confidence
opportunities.description: Ensure a broad candidate pipeline throughout the search process to provide stakeholders with multiple options.
opportunities.supportingQuote: There was some stress at one point that, like, man, are we putting all our eggs in one basket... at the 11th hour, Korn Ferry pulled a rabbit out of their hat with the candidate that ultimately got this job.
opportunities.suggestedAction: Continue to source and present additional strong candidates late in the process to reassure clients.

opportunities.title: Enhance Candidate Pipeline Visibility
opportunities.description: Ensure that the candidate pipeline feels broad enough throughout the search process to avoid over-reliance on a single finalist.
opportunities.supportingQuote: At one stage the search felt too dependent on a single finalist, creating concern about having options for stakeholders.
opportunities.suggestedAction: Regularly update clients on the status and breadth of the candidate pipeline to maintain confidence.

opportunities.title: Need for Quicker Interim Updates
opportunities.description: Dr. Nina expressed a desire for quicker interim updates to reassure stakeholders, rather than waiting weeks for a polished shortlist.
opportunities.supportingQuote: It would have been better to just get...the first profile to work with...and tell them [yes] that's going in the right direction.
opportunities.suggestedAction: Implement a process for sharing early draft profiles to provide quicker feedback and maintain stakeholder engagement.

opportunities.title: Enhance Flexibility in Processes
opportunities.description: There is a need for more flexibility in Korn Ferry's structured processes to better align with client expectations and working styles.
opportunities.supportingQuote: Sometimes I would have liked them to be a bit more...flexible.
opportunities.suggestedAction: Introduce more adaptive processes that allow for flexibility while maintaining quality management standards.

opportunities.title: Address Initial Perception of Disengagement
opportunities.description: The CFO initially felt Korn Ferry was disengaged, which could affect future engagements if not addressed.
opportunities.supportingQuote: In the very beginning [the CFO] really had the impression they [Korn Ferry] didn't want to do the job.
opportunities.suggestedAction: Proactively engage with key stakeholders early in the process to clarify commitment and prevent misperceptions.

opportunities.title: Improve Response Times
opportunities.description: Emails sometimes went unanswered for extended periods, leading to frustration.
opportunities.supportingQuote: Sometimes it took 30 hours or so but you have an email to three [people] so you would have thought at least one of them could just tell me, look, we are going to answer maybe tomorrow.
opportunities.suggestedAction: Establish clear response time expectations and ensure team members are accountable for timely communication.

opportunities.title: Adopt Modern Data Handling Practices
opportunities.description: Dr. Nina preferred secure methods for data sharing, such as shared drives, over email.
opportunities.supportingQuote: I'd rather you share your drive, you can put them there, and once the search is finished, I'm going to close the drive.
opportunities.suggestedAction: Transition to using secure, client-preferred data sharing methods to enhance data security and client satisfaction.

opportunities.title: Advisory on AI and Workforce Evolution
opportunities.description: Stephen expressed interest in understanding AI's impact on the workforce, skill development, and compensation structures, indicating a potential need for advisory services in this area.
opportunities.supportingQuote: AI awareness is something always on my mind… it’s confusing, but it’s changing how younger generations develop within the workforce.
opportunities.suggestedAction: Initiate discussions with Stephen about potential advisory services on AI's impact on talent and compensation strategies.

opportunities.title: Broader Engagement as DLH Grows
opportunities.description: Stephen is open to using Korn Ferry more broadly as DLH Holdings expands, suggesting opportunities for deeper engagement.
opportunities.supportingQuote: I would consider using them more broadly as DLH Holdings grows.
opportunities.suggestedAction: Maintain regular communication with Stephen to identify new areas for collaboration as DLH Holdings expands.

opportunities.title: Strengthen Internal Quality Control
opportunities.description: Occasional errors in presentation materials have been noted, indicating a need to reinforce quality control measures to maintain client confidence.
opportunities.supportingQuote: I always trust their work. But...there are times where I have found mistakes...which I'm kind of surprised about.
opportunities.suggestedAction: Implement additional quality checks on deliverables to ensure accuracy before materials are circulated to clients.

opportunities.title: Enhance Quality Assurance in Deliverables
opportunities.description: Stephen noted occasional calculation errors in presentations, suggesting a need for improved quality assurance processes.
opportunities.supportingQuote: Occasional calculation/formula errors in presentations slightly undermined confidence.
opportunities.suggestedAction: Enhance quality assurance processes to prevent errors in client deliverables and maintain high service standards.

opportunities.title: Post-Placement Follow-Up
opportunities.description: Vanessa expressed interest in Korn Ferry conducting follow-up calls with placed candidates to gather feedback and reinforce the relationship.
opportunities.supportingQuote: I really hope that they will do a follow up with [our placement]...when she's [been] here for a few weeks and then maybe within three or six months....Give her a call and really ask like how is it going and then give me the feedback because that's really valuable for me.
opportunities.suggestedAction: Implement a structured post-placement follow-up process to gather feedback from both the client and the candidate.

opportunities.title: Timely Report Delivery
opportunities.description: The initial candidate report was delivered too close to the interview, limiting preparation time, which was later corrected.
opportunities.supportingQuote: They sent the first candidate report...48 hours before the interview...I told them that this was too short.
opportunities.suggestedAction: Standardize earlier report delivery timelines to ensure clients have sufficient preparation time before interviews.

opportunities.title: Consistency in Report Content
opportunities.description: An early report lacked specific details required for the interview, which was quickly addressed.
opportunities.supportingQuote: There was also some information missing... but they were very reactive and adapted it for the next reports.
opportunities.suggestedAction: Ensure all candidate reports consistently include comprehensive details to support interview preparation.

opportunities.title: Deepen Executive Search Engagement
opportunities.description: Vanessa is highly satisfied with Korn Ferry's performance for senior-level searches and views them as a premium partner for top-tier roles.
opportunities.supportingQuote: For ExCo positions, yes. For other positions, no, because actually their fees are higher than all the other headhunters in Belgium.
opportunities.suggestedAction: Focus on strengthening and expanding Korn Ferry's executive search services for senior-level roles within Heidelberg Materials.

opportunities.title: Reinforce Trusted Partner Experience
opportunities.description: Vanessa values the trust and relationship continuity with Korn Ferry, which was a decisive factor in choosing them.
opportunities.supportingQuote: Part of it is indeed the trust I have in Olivier Top as a consultant.
opportunities.suggestedAction: Maintain and reinforce the trusted partner experience through consistent, client-led communication and relationship management.

opportunities.title: Broader Expertise and Data Utilization
opportunities.description: Lisa expressed interest in using Korn Ferry's broader expertise and data for various needs, indicating potential future requirements in this area.
opportunities.supportingQuote: I'm like I actually need something in this area, have you got something that would help, while it's not everyday...there's been a sharing of all the resources that are available to us.
opportunities.suggestedAction: Proactively offer insights and data solutions that could benefit PartnerRe's strategic needs.

opportunities.title: Deepen Partnership with Tailored Approaches
opportunities.description: Lisa appreciates the tailored, thoughtful approach of Korn Ferry, suggesting room to expand the relationship by continuing to customize services.
opportunities.supportingQuote: What I appreciate about Korn Ferry is there's no such thing as one size fits all...I certainly experienced [customer centricity].
opportunities.suggestedAction: Continue to develop and offer customized solutions that align with PartnerRe's unique culture and needs.

opportunities.title: Enhance Listening and Coordination
opportunities.description: Lisa noted opportunities to improve listening and coordination, especially in multi-region engagements, indicating a need to strengthen these aspects.
opportunities.supportingQuote: There's probably a little bit more listening needed on the US side than the European side... there's just that opportunity really, really just listen...
opportunities.suggestedAction: Implement training and processes to enhance listening skills and coordination in cross-regional projects.

opportunities.title: Streamline Scheduling Processes
opportunities.description: Minor issues with scheduling and last-minute meeting arrangements were noted, suggesting a need for process improvement.
opportunities.supportingQuote: I know there's been some [difficulty] trying to get meetings in the diary with CFF last minute, which is never going to work for her.
opportunities.suggestedAction: Establish clear scheduling protocols and improve communication to prevent last-minute conflicts.

opportunities.title: Ensure Consistency Across Teams
opportunities.description: The quality of delivery has varied when different consultants lead searches, impacting client satisfaction.
opportunities.supportingQuote: I wasn't as impressed...we had a talent search...the person that was on it was fine but then he ended up leaving so wasn't as engaged...Jerry took over and we were able to move the process along pretty quickly...it depends on the team that you're working with.
opportunities.suggestedAction: Implement standardized processes and training to ensure consistent delivery quality across all teams.

opportunities.title: Share Market Insights and Compensation Benchmarking
opportunities.description: Cana expressed interest in receiving periodic benchmarking or compensation insights to aid decision-making.
opportunities.supportingQuote: If we could get more comp benchmarking surveys. I know that when we used to work... with Heidrick & Struggles, they would send us an annual comp report which was helpful.
opportunities.suggestedAction: Develop and share regular market insights and compensation benchmarking reports with Macquarie.

opportunities.title: Support in Diversity, Equity & Inclusion Initiatives
opportunities.description: Macquarie is focused on increasing diverse representation in senior hiring, which Korn Ferry can support.
opportunities.supportingQuote: Key HR priorities include: Diversity, Equity & Inclusion: increasing diverse representation in senior hiring.
opportunities.suggestedAction: Offer tailored search strategies and candidate pools to enhance diversity in senior hiring.

opportunities.title: Digital and AI Integration Support
opportunities.description: Macquarie is expanding its technological capability and data-led decision-making, presenting an opportunity for Korn Ferry to assist.
opportunities.supportingQuote: Key HR priorities include: Digital and AI integration: expanding technological capability and data-led decision-making across the business.
opportunities.suggestedAction: Provide insights or partnerships that enhance digital and AI integration in talent acquisition and management.

opportunities.title: Talent Development for New Growth Areas
opportunities.description: Macquarie is focusing on talent development for private equity adjacencies and entrepreneurial fund structures.
opportunities.supportingQuote: Key HR priorities include: Talent development for new growth areas: including private equity adjacencies and entrepreneurial fund structures.
opportunities.suggestedAction: Collaborate with Macquarie to identify and develop talent strategies for emerging growth areas.

opportunities.title: Enhanced Assessment Services
opportunities.description: Mike expressed a need for more insightful and actionable assessment outputs that align with client expectations.
opportunities.supportingQuote: It took a long time and the insights were lacking...I [asked] specifically [for] data on peers, data on up...[but they] didn't do what was instructed.
opportunities.suggestedAction: Review and enhance the assessment design to provide clearer, more actionable insights that meet client expectations.

opportunities.title: Leverage Dan's Consultative Approach Firm-wide
opportunities.description: Mike's positive experience was largely due to Dan's strategic and consultative approach, suggesting potential for broader application across the firm.

opportunities.description: Felix expressed a desire for more modern and interactive training tools, such as e-learning or multimedia resources.
opportunities.supportingQuote: I would wish to have something like more interactive... a nice movie and e-learning would also be helpful... could be a bit more modern.
opportunities.suggestedAction: Develop and offer more contemporary training formats, including e-learning and multimedia resources.

opportunities.title: Enhance Market Data Configurability
opportunities.description: Felix noted limitations in market data outputs, particularly the inability to filter companies by bonus-paying status, which affects benchmarking accuracy.
opportunities.supportingQuote: I miss... very specific aspects... I cannot say I don't want to see only companies who pay a bonus...
opportunities.suggestedAction: Introduce clearer filters in market data to differentiate between bonus-paying and non-bonus-paying companies.

opportunities.title: Affordable Grading Tool Needed
opportunities.description: Felix created their own grading tool due to dissatisfaction with available options, indicating a need for a practical and cost-effective solution.
opportunities.supportingQuote: I've also created a grading tool by ourselves, because they don't provide one which is very useful or not too expensive.
opportunities.suggestedAction: Explore and offer a practical, affordable grading tool to meet client needs.

opportunities.title: Address Functional vs Hierarchical Leadership
opportunities.description: Felix found it difficult to benchmark roles with functional versus hierarchical leadership within the current methodology.
opportunities.supportingQuote: Many people have functional leadership roles in comparison with hierarchical... can be difficult.
opportunities.suggestedAction: Provide guidance and examples on handling functional versus hierarchical leadership roles within the methodology.

opportunities.title: Maintain Strong Responsiveness and Trust
opportunities.description: Felix appreciated the strong rapport and responsiveness of the Korn Ferry team, which was a key positive aspect of the engagement.
opportunities.supportingQuote: With the colleagues of the team... I get very well... they are very responsive, and I don't have feelings that... you cannot trust them.
opportunities.suggestedAction: Continue to prioritize responsiveness and relationship-building to maintain client trust and satisfaction.

opportunities.title: Onboarding Support for New CEO
opportunities.description: The onboarding support for the new CEO has been promised but not yet commenced, indicating a future need for this service.
opportunities.supportingQuote: They have promised us that they will be there... but it hasn't really begun yet.
opportunities.suggestedAction: Initiate the onboarding support process promptly to fulfill the commitment and ensure a smooth transition for the new CEO.

opportunities.title: Single Point of Contact for Communication
opportunities.description: Early confusion was caused by communications from multiple Korn Ferry staff, suggesting the need for a single contact point.
opportunities.supportingQuote: Early on, it was a little confusing... several different people... reaching out... we couldn't search for [emails] easily.
opportunities.suggestedAction: Establish a single, consistent communication point at the start of projects to streamline information flow and reduce confusion.

opportunities.title: Leverage Institutional Knowledge for Future Projects
opportunities.description: Korn Ferry's familiarity with the museum has been beneficial, suggesting an opportunity to deepen the relationship by leveraging this knowledge in future projects.
opportunities.supportingQuote: They had helped us with salary surveys... market analyses... job description... we'd been working with them on and off for two or three years.
opportunities.suggestedAction: Propose additional services or projects where Korn Ferry's institutional knowledge can be an asset, reinforcing the partnership.

opportunities.title: Follow Through on Promised Onboarding Support
opportunities.description: The onboarding support has not yet begun, signaling a need to re-engage and ensure this commitment is met.
opportunities.supportingQuote: They have promised us that they will be there... but it hasn't really begun yet.
opportunities.suggestedAction: Re-engage with the client to confirm the timeline and details for the onboarding support, ensuring expectations are met.

opportunities.title: Enhanced Gender-Diverse Sourcing
opportunities.description: Jeanette expressed a need for more gender-diverse candidate slates in future searches, indicating a requirement for proactive processes to ensure balanced representation.
opportunities.supportingQuote: We had to remind the guys a number of times that we want to see women as well as men.
opportunities.suggestedAction: Implement transparent, proactive processes to ensure balanced slates and review team composition on projects to avoid limiting diverse sourcing perspectives.

opportunities.title: Improved Compensation Discovery Process
opportunities.description: The current process for obtaining compensation information was slow and insufficient, impacting the negotiation and offer stages.
opportunities.supportingQuote: Trying to get out of them what current comp was, was impossible.
opportunities.suggestedAction: Gather full, detailed compensation information early in the process to reduce back-and-forth with candidates and prevent delays at the offer stage.

opportunities.title: Rebuild Trust with Assertive Leadership
opportunities.description: Jeanette's experience was inconsistent with previous positive impressions, leading to doubts about future engagements.
opportunities.supportingQuote: I'm not sure we'll go back there again, because that was really hard work at the end.
opportunities.suggestedAction: Proactively highlight recommended candidates, lead discussions confidently, and guide decision-making to rebuild trust and confidence.

opportunities.title: Timely Delivery of Reports and Materials
opportunities.description: Reports were often shared too late for adequate preparation, impacting the efficiency of the process.
opportunities.supportingQuote: The reports would often land an hour or two before the call... you have no hope in hell of getting to it.
opportunities.suggestedAction: Share reports and candidate materials with sufficient lead time for stakeholders to review, maintaining momentum from the outset.

opportunities.title: Proactive Brief Refinement
opportunities.description: There was a lack of proactive correction when the brief was misaligned, which could be improved to enhance client satisfaction.
opportunities.supportingQuote: They didn't seem to instinctively pick up that it wasn't quite right... they just kept pushing forward.
opportunities.suggestedAction: Raise any concerns about candidate fit, search direction, or brief interpretation proactively to ensure alignment and client satisfaction.

opportunities.title: Need for Succession Planning Support
opportunities.description: Greg Aarssen expressed interest in involving Korn Ferry in improving succession planning and reducing blind spots within the organization.
opportunities.supportingQuote: I think we need to have someone that is doing some of these... evaluations and analysis to make sure that we don't have blind spots.
opportunities.suggestedAction: Korn Ferry should propose a detailed plan for succession planning services to address potential blind spots.

opportunities.title: Expand into Board-Level Support
opportunities.description: There is an opportunity to expand the relationship by providing board-level support and more rigorous succession assessment.
opportunities.supportingQuote: Greg sees clear scope for more rigorous succession assessment and board-level support, and is already exploring this with Korn Ferry.
opportunities.suggestedAction: Korn Ferry should engage with Greg to outline potential board-level support services and succession assessment offerings.

opportunities.title: Re-engage for Future Executive Searches
opportunities.description: Greg expressed a strong intent to reuse Korn Ferry for future executive searches, indicating a need to maintain engagement.
opportunities.supportingQuote: Would I ever use these people again? I can't imagine not using them again.
opportunities.suggestedAction: Korn Ferry should maintain regular check-ins with Greg to ensure continued satisfaction and readiness for future engagements.

opportunities.title: Increase Visibility in the Market
opportunities.description: Greg suggested that Korn Ferry could potentially strengthen its visibility in the market.
opportunities.supportingQuote: He struggled to identify any issues with the work itself, suggesting only that Korn Ferry could potentially strengthen its visibility.
opportunities.suggestedAction: Korn Ferry should consider marketing strategies to enhance its visibility and brand presence in the industry.

opportunities.title: Need for concise assessment reports
opportunities.description: The CEO expressed a desire for more concise and clearly framed assessment reports, particularly focusing on specific behavioral aspects like handling conflict and restructuring.
opportunities.supportingQuote: The documents are long and very nuanced, and you might sometimes maybe have wished them to be a little bit more black and white.
opportunities.suggestedAction: Develop a format for executive summaries that highlight key behavioral flags in a concise manner.

opportunities.title: Enhance parking facilities for client visits
opportunities.description: The CEO mentioned a minor irritation with the lack of parking spaces at Korn Ferry's office, which could affect the client experience.
opportunities.supportingQuote: I'd wish they had parking spaces in their own office, because you always have to go to another building... it's a bit annoying.
opportunities.suggestedAction: Explore options to improve parking facilities or provide clear guidance to clients on parking arrangements.

opportunities.title: Leverage strong individual relationships
opportunities.description: The CEO's decision to work with Korn Ferry was heavily influenced by trust in specific individuals, suggesting potential for deepening relationships with key stakeholders.
opportunities.supportingQuote: I knew the boss, I knew the consultant that I wanted to work with, because I have a deep trust in [Danny]'s... human touch.
opportunities.suggestedAction: Continue to nurture and leverage strong individual relationships with key decision-makers to expand engagement opportunities.

opportunities.title: Maintain fast and transparent processes
opportunities.description: The CEO appreciated the speed and efficiency of the candidate sourcing and interview process, indicating the importance of maintaining these strengths.
opportunities.supportingQuote: Everything went very fast, the finding of the candidates in both roles... the interviewing phase... was quite efficient.
opportunities.suggestedAction: Ensure that fast sourcing and efficient interview processes are consistently applied in future engagements to reinforce client satisfaction.

opportunities.title: Reintroduce Dual-Consultant Model
opportunities.description: The dual-consultant model was a unique differentiator that added value through diverse perspectives. Its removal has reduced the perceived quality of consultation.
opportunities.supportingQuote: That was the differentiating factor... two different individuals from two different cultures.
opportunities.suggestedAction: Explore the feasibility of reintroducing the dual-consultant model selectively in high-value markets or key accounts.

opportunities.title: Clarify Assessment Tool Value
opportunities.description: Assessment tools were provided but not used, as they did not support Jan's decision-making process.
opportunities.supportingQuote: We got that for free in some instances, but honestly, I didn't use it.
opportunities.suggestedAction: Provide clearer guidance on when and how assessment tools can add value to the hiring process.

opportunities.title: Strengthen Consultation Quality
opportunities.description: The removal of the second consultant has led to a perceived reduction in consultation quality.
opportunities.supportingQuote: We got different quality of the consultations because obviously the second person was adding a certain perspective and value.
opportunities.suggestedAction: Consider ways to enhance consultation quality, possibly by incorporating diverse perspectives in other ways.

opportunities.title: Position Broader Consulting Services Separately
opportunities.description: Jan does not assume Korn Ferry's search capabilities translate to transformation or development work.
opportunities.supportingQuote: No, because that's a different skill set... I would again pitch and see who's best.
opportunities.suggestedAction: Ensure broader consulting services are introduced by the right experts and positioned as distinct capabilities.

opportunities.title: Broader Candidate Sourcing for High-Profile Roles
opportunities.description: Gary expressed a need for a more expansive search that includes candidates from diverse backgrounds and sectors, particularly for high-profile roles.
opportunities.supportingQuote: I had urged them to look broad... like college presidents... and they didn't really do that.
opportunities.suggestedAction: Korn Ferry should expand their candidate sourcing strategies to include a wider range of backgrounds and sectors for high-profile roles.

opportunities.title: Early Validation of Candidate Commitment
opportunities.description: There is a need to confirm practical considerations such as relocation readiness earlier in the process to prevent late-stage withdrawals.
opportunities.supportingQuote: Korn Ferry should have vetted this ahead of time... before we went through this final testing.
opportunities.suggestedAction: Implement a more rigorous early-stage validation process for candidate commitment, particularly regarding relocation.

opportunities.title: Ensure Continuity and Ownership in Engagements
opportunities.description: Gary noted a drop in engagement quality due to changes in team leadership, highlighting the need for consistent ownership throughout the process.
opportunities.supportingQuote: It just felt a little bit... an ownership thing.
opportunities.suggestedAction: Ensure clear ownership and consistent client touchpoints are maintained throughout the engagement, even when team changes occur.

opportunities.title: Explore Adjacent Leadership Capabilities
opportunities.description: Gary sees value in considering candidates with adjacent or transferable leadership capabilities for senior roles.
opportunities.supportingQuote: Continue to explore a wide range of potential backgrounds and experiences, particularly for high-profile roles.
opportunities.suggestedAction: Encourage the exploration of candidates with adjacent leadership capabilities to add value to high-profile roles.

opportunities.title: Need for Enhanced Partnership Engagement
opportunities.description: Julie expressed a need for more collaborative and respectful engagement, particularly in recognizing her role and authority.
opportunities.supportingQuote: It definitely feels like a diminishment of my role.
opportunities.suggestedAction: Ensure consistent recognition of the primary client contact's role and foster a more collaborative partnership approach.

opportunities.title: Deepen Relationship with Collaborative Fee Handling
opportunities.description: Julie indicated that a more partnership-led approach to fee discussions could strengthen the relationship.
opportunities.supportingQuote: Being treated like that makes me not want to work with them again.
opportunities.suggestedAction: Apply discretion in fee-related discussions to align with expectations of a long-term partnership.

opportunities.title: Re-engage with Improved Communication
opportunities.description: Julie felt sidelined and not respected in her role, indicating a need to re-engage with improved communication and respect.
opportunities.supportingQuote: They're managing up... in a way that felt somewhat disrespectful to me and my role.
opportunities.suggestedAction: Reinforce partnership-led engagement behaviors and ensure the primary contact feels respected and valued.

opportunities.title: Streamline Operational Logistics
opportunities.description: Julie mentioned that Korn Ferry relies too heavily on internal resources for logistics, suggesting a need for clearer operational responsibilities.
opportunities.supportingQuote: They rely on us very heavily for everything logistical...It feels like they kind of expect us to do their logistics.
opportunities.suggestedAction: Rebalance operational responsibilities to ensure internal teams are not carrying disproportionate effort.

opportunities.title: Enhance Process Management Continuity
opportunities.description: Repeated requests for previously shared materials indicate inefficiencies in process management.
opportunities.supportingQuote: They were like, 'Oh, we don't have that template. Can you send it again?'
opportunities.suggestedAction: Strengthen continuity in process management to minimize duplication and improve efficiency.

opportunities.title: Need for Broader Consulting Support
opportunities.description: Tim mentioned that broader consulting support may be needed as the organization scales, indicating potential future engagements beyond executive search.
opportunities.supportingQuote: I think we'd need a bit more scale before we went to somebody of Korn Ferry size to do other work like that.
opportunities.suggestedAction: Monitor Logistics UK's growth and proactively offer consulting services as they scale.

opportunities.title: Expand Use of Psychometric Tools
opportunities.description: Tim values the psychometric assessment tools and plans to use them for development plans, suggesting an opportunity to expand their application.
opportunities.supportingQuote: We use their psychometric tools for assessment, and they were very, very good. It will be used for a development plan, yeah, absolutely.
opportunities.suggestedAction: Offer additional training or workshops on leveraging psychometric tools for development planning.

opportunities.title: Re-engage on Leadership Capability Development
opportunities.description: With a focus on enhancing senior leadership's outward-facing credibility, there is an opportunity to re-engage with Logistics UK on leadership development initiatives.
opportunities.supportingQuote: The most important thing for us is that our outward facing activities are done by really high-quality people.
opportunities.suggestedAction: Propose a leadership development program focused on enhancing outward-facing skills and credibility.

opportunities.title: Support for Upcoming Organizational Transformation
opportunities.description: ASML is anticipating a broader organizational transformation in the coming year, which may require additional support from Korn Ferry.
opportunities.supportingQuote: It will be a culture change… but we all don’t know what it is.
opportunities.suggestedAction: Proactively engage with ASML to discuss potential support and services that could assist with their upcoming transformation.

opportunities.title: Iterative Program Design for Enhanced Value
opportunities.description: The ability to refine the program cohort by cohort is seen as a differentiator, suggesting an opportunity to expand this iterative approach.
opportunities.supportingQuote: After every cohort, we can tweak a little bit to make every cohort a better program.
opportunities.suggestedAction: Explore additional ways to leverage iterative program design to further enhance the value delivered to ASML.

opportunities.title: Increase Awareness of Broader Capabilities
opportunities.description: Alexander expressed limited awareness of Korn Ferry's broader offerings beyond executive search services.
opportunities.supportingQuote: I'm not aware of what other products or services they offer.
opportunities.suggestedAction: Develop a strategy to increase awareness of Korn Ferry's full range of services among current clients like Alexander.

opportunities.title: Leverage Pay Benchmarking and Market Insight
opportunities.description: Alexander values Korn Ferry's compensation insights for internal decision-making and budget alignment.
opportunities.supportingQuote: We're asking Korn Ferry for market data on pay... It's helpful for us... so that the hiring leader can go back to their senior leader and present that and make a case.
opportunities.suggestedAction: Promote Korn Ferry's market insight services as a key value-add to deepen client relationships.

opportunities.title: Promote Assessment Tools Usage
opportunities.description: Korn Ferry's assessment tools have not been actively used due to hiring leader preferences, not dissatisfaction.
opportunities.supportingQuote: They're not necessarily looking at any assessment tools... They like to just have a conversation with the particular candidate.
opportunities.suggestedAction: Engage with hiring leaders to demonstrate the value and effectiveness of Korn Ferry's assessment tools in the recruitment process.

opportunities.title: Enhance Visibility of Broader Capabilities
opportunities.description: There is an opportunity to reinforce the visibility of Korn Ferry's broader capabilities to clients like Alexander.
opportunities.supportingQuote: Opportunity to increase awareness of broader capabilities.
opportunities.suggestedAction: Implement a light-touch awareness campaign to inform clients about the full spectrum of Korn Ferry's services.

opportunities.title: Need for Early Collaborative Re-alignment
opportunities.description: When a new internal lead steps in mid-stream, there is value in consciously rebuilding the relationship and re-contracting ways of working.
opportunities.supportingQuote: We could have gone aside a bit more together as colleagues.
opportunities.suggestedAction: Implement a structured 'reset' conversation when client-side ownership changes mid-engagement to re-establish working preferences and decision dynamics.

opportunities.title: Continued Willingness to Work with Korn Ferry
opportunities.description: Despite mid-process challenges, Luke indicated a willingness to work with Korn Ferry again, with careful consideration of context.
opportunities.supportingQuote: I would, I would do. I would be very specific about circumstance and everything and all of that.
opportunities.suggestedAction: Engage with Luke to understand specific circumstances and contexts where collaboration would be most beneficial.

opportunities.title: Reinforce Confidence During Difficult Phases
opportunities.description: As a search becomes more complex and option sets reduce, it is important to reinforce shared direction and progress to mitigate client frustration.
opportunities.supportingQuote: It was obvious to see that there was a bit of frustration.
opportunities.suggestedAction: Pay attention to client signals of frustration or fatigue and find small ways to reinforce shared direction and progress.

opportunities.title: Early Calibration on Scope
opportunities.description: Where an assignment is both sensitive and narrowly defined, it may help to build in deliberate early checkpoints to confirm whether the search has sufficient breadth.
opportunities.supportingQuote: There had been a decision to be very precise about the type of person that the business wanted to appoint, and I think that made it more challenging.
opportunities.suggestedAction: Implement early checkpoints in the search process to ensure the scope is broad enough to sustain momentum over time.

opportunities.title: Need for Implementation Support
opportunities.description: Lesley expressed a need for consultants to remain engaged through the implementation phase to ensure successful execution of recommendations.
opportunities.supportingQuote: I do think it's really important that consultants see that their role is to ensure successful implementation, rather than just recommendation.
opportunities.suggestedAction: Korn Ferry should offer ongoing implementation support services to ensure recommendations are effectively executed.

opportunities.title: Broader Appreciation of Korn Ferry's Capabilities
opportunities.description: Lesley developed a greater appreciation of Korn Ferry's broader capabilities, particularly in commercial aspects, indicating openness to future engagements.
opportunities.supportingQuote: I've now got a greater appreciation of the breadth that Korn Ferry can bring to us... particularly the much more commercial aspects of it.
opportunities.suggestedAction: Korn Ferry should explore opportunities to offer additional services that align with Lesley's newfound appreciation of their capabilities.

opportunities.title: Strengthen Internal Ownership Alignment
opportunities.description: Lesley highlighted the need for stronger internal ownership of implementation, suggesting a gap in alignment during delivery.
opportunities.supportingQuote: I needed the people I would look to to implement, to actually own it. And I'm not too sure that that happened in the way that I wanted.
opportunities.suggestedAction: Korn Ferry should facilitate workshops or meetings to ensure internal stakeholders are aligned and committed to owning the implementation process.

opportunities.title: Earlier Escalation of Delivery Constraints
opportunities.description: Lesley noted that earlier recognition and escalation of delivery constraints could have enabled faster adjustments and clearer authority.
opportunities.supportingQuote: I think I may have wanted to know a little bit earlier that they were getting stymied, you know, just held up a little bit.
opportunities.suggestedAction: Korn Ferry should implement a protocol for early escalation of delivery constraints to allow for timely adjustments.

opportunities.title: Anticipate Future Engineering Discipline Needs
opportunities.description: Karina highlighted a decline in candidate availability for certain engineering disciplines, suggesting a need to anticipate and prepare for future hiring challenges in these areas.
opportunities.supportingQuote: We're seeing a decline in availability in certain engineering disciplines like electrical engineering.
opportunities.suggestedAction: Korn Ferry should proactively build a pipeline of candidates in scarce engineering disciplines to meet future demand.

opportunities.title: Deepen Relationship with Structured Updates
opportunities.description: The structured communication and regular updates have been positively received, indicating an opportunity to deepen the relationship by continuing and enhancing these practices.
opportunities.supportingQuote: Greg scheduled by monthly calls with the team... to give us updates, to share... additional context on the candidates.
opportunities.suggestedAction: Maintain and potentially increase the frequency of structured updates to further strengthen the relationship.

opportunities.title: Maintain Engagement During Market Constraints
opportunities.description: Karina noted market constraints affecting candidate availability, suggesting the need to keep stakeholders engaged and informed during these periods.
opportunities.supportingQuote: We're all kind of seeing a decline in availability in certain engineering disciplines like electrical engineering.
opportunities.suggestedAction: Keep an open dialogue with stakeholders about market conditions and potential adjustments to search strategies.

opportunities.title: Enhance Early Candidate Screening
opportunities.description: The early screening of candidate interest and fit has been effective, but there is room to enhance this process to further protect stakeholder time.
opportunities.supportingQuote: They were already... testing interest and availability up front.
opportunities.suggestedAction: Continue to refine the early screening process to ensure candidates are well-aligned with ExxonMobil's needs before progressing.
